Sinopse: Just like all the men in his family, high-school student Van Wilder, even before becoming the popular party animal of Coolidge College in National Lampoon's Van Wilder (2002), was already a sexual champion. As he sets foot in the campus as a cocky freshman, Van is shocked to discover that strict Dean Reardon rules the place with an iron fist, restricting alcohol, drugs, and all things sexy. Now, Van must put his charm and wits to good use and do everything in his power to escape from the dean's ROTC program, and get Kaitlin, the hottest girl in school. Has Van what it takes to become a hero?—Nick Riganas
